org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.impl

Class BroadcastGroupImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.impl.BroadcastGroupImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent, BroadcastGroup

    public class BroadcastGroupImpl
extends Object
implements BroadcastGroup, Runnable

    This class will use the BroadcastEndpoint to send periodical updates on the list for connections used by this server.

    This is totally generic to the mechanism used on the transmission. It originally only had UDP but this got refactored into sub classes of BroadcastEndpoint

    Author:
    Tim Fox, Clebert Suconic Created 15 Nov 2008 09:45:32
